page.title: 03PRE- READING SCHEME.
page.content: Because of the{very isolated and } {lonely life}of many pre-school children in this area the school has established a scheme to bring these youngsters together to provide them with an introduction to books and the pleasures of reading along with the social activities of school life. The weekly session begins with the {changing of library books}from a selection specifically aimed at this age group.A session of{perceptual} {games}follows which are ostensibly fun but are structured to develop visual and auditory powers of memory and discrimination.The session concludes with{action songs}chosen to allow the children to be innovative in both action and making up new verses. {The County Psychological Service}see this sheme as being of a great benefit to those suffering from loneliness.
